comment: She is a wonderful professor.  She is compassionate about her students and what she is teaching.  I took a hybrid version of this class and the quizzes come straight from the material.  Very understanding if a group member isn't pulling their weight on assignments and will let you work solo.  She is wonderful.

Take her! Take her! She talks a lot, but you can tell she really knows her stuff and has a passion for teaching. She really uses D2L,but she makes sure you know where to find everything. She is the most helpful prof I've had yet--always responds to emails quickly,is flexible/understanding. A lot of group work, but no tests!
